activities: We do not store any personal information other than name, address, email, type of account, and how they are paying.  All payment information is held by the Authorization.net.  All other information is encrypted and we do not have or hold the encryption key in our offices.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All customer data is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework, and none is manually processed.
privacyprograms: eTrust, First Data - PCI Compliance, and Authorization.net
